title: NFL Commissioner On Controversial Suspension: 'I Didn't Get It Right'
teaser: Robert Siegel talks with ESPN sportswriter Jane McManus about the NFL's new domestic violence initiative under its personal conduct policy. The plan comes the league leveled what some called a lenient penalty for running back Ray Rice's alleged domestic abuse.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
